node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Fine Wines and Better Times on August 23, 2021 tagging @cigaraficionado, @kellyaxelrad, @padroncigars, @seaboss, @clossolene, @jmercado7070, @redheadwines, @champagnesquadofficial, and @johnriccardo. May be an image of 3 people and people standing.

node.text: Well we rolled off the mountain after visiting with Aaron Pott and sped to a special event for 20 people put on by 2 of my other favorite wine producers Lokoya and Cardinale in an epic collaboration with the world famous Padrón Cigars. It was held at Zack and Ashley Taylors house who put on a show like no other in the back yard of their beautiful home. As we stepped into the small gathering we were greeted by 2 legends in their own right Jorge and Orlando Padrón and their lovely wives.  And we proceeded to drink amazing bottles of Lokoya and Cardinale while smoking amazing Padrón Cigars and Eating an amazing meal that Zack and Ashley put together.  Again this collaboration was born from an idea Valerie @thefashionistaconsignment and Brian Baker put together when Chris Carpenter ( wine maker extraordinare)was visiting in Miami and Val put them together for a magical night that went until the wee hours of the morning. That led to this weekend of amazing events.  I could not come empty handed and thought hard and long of what to bring to pair with these outstanding cigars, outrageous wines, and gourmet food. So we ended this enchanting evening with an 1851 Berry Brothers & Rudd Finest Old Verdelho Solera Madeira and a Borges & Irmão 1900 Colheita Port (google these bad boys)! I must stop for a moment and talk about the proud and illustrious but more importantly humble tradition of Padrón Cigars. Started by the Patriarch of the family José Orlando Padrón in 1964 with just a $600 dollar investment (earned while using a “Hammer” given to him by a friend to be a carpenter) and after leaving his homeland in Cuba as so many others did. He would never cut corners or compromise.. his mission was to create hand made cigars of the highest quality! Only the finest Nicaraguan tobacco  is hand rolled into these beauties. If you have never smoked one of these masterpieces then you have never lived!!! A Special thx to Brian Baker and Erik Ackerman who make all great things possible and magical at Lokoya and Cardinale ( they put Walt Disney himself to shame) !!! @padroncigars @bighousetobaccooutlet @cardinalewinery #cigars #cigarsmoker @cigaraficionado #cigarporn #wine #napa

node.text: Just got back from 4 days in Napa and have a lot of great things to share with my faithful followers. But let’s start with pulling the sled 🛷 up the mountain, because youuuu goto the mountain when it’s Aaron Pott … wine royalty at its best but an outlaw at heart. He is one of the most knowledgeable and experienced wine gurus you will meet out there and if he doesn’t know you wellll then you better step up your game. The man the myth and the legend and quite the family man met us outside his tasting room hopped in the driver seat of our car and proceeded to show us his incredible property as you can see in the pics.  His slice of heaven would make the Gods jealous. After learning a lot of history and geography we headed to the tasting room where we proceeded to taste a bevy of beauties from his venerable stable. If you are not buying these wines … well you better not be be calling yourself a collector of fine wines. The man is a genius and Bacchus himself has built temples to him praying he gets the following year highly coveted allocation ( as the late great George Carlin would put it “it’s ok to covet great wine but not ok to covet your neighbors wife… unless of course she has a great cellar”). We started with the gorgeous 20 meter 3 viogne that was perfect on this hot day with hints of apricot and tropical fruits… followed by the 2019 Her Magesty’s Secret Service sourced from the stagecoach vineyard. This is a Y2B2 yum yum berry bomb with great tannins. Then the 19 Kaliholmanok Cab came in as one of my favorites of the trip.  If you love great Bordeaux and u want a bottle that will age gracefully then this gem is what you want. But what rocked my world was the 2019 Space in Time ( Mt Veeder) cherries and more berries blend of Cab Franc, Cab Sauv and Merlot. Drop the mike quality and taste!  They give so little space to really get into these wines but they were all delicious. Get on this list and buy with Extreme prejudice …the man is a Napa Treasure, a gentleman and his wines rock the Casbah!!! Ooops how dare I forget the 2019 Incubo chocked full of eucalyptus a hint of Hershey kiss’s and blueberry snow cone.  Wow 🤩 blend of cab Franc and cab sauv. #wine

node.text: As sun sets on this gorgeous island ( check out the view of our Villa on the hill from the new top beach club Gyp Sea. We had to think go big or go home and that ain’t happening until Sunday.  So what’s as exotic and seductive as this Island wellllll I think this lineup does it justice!  Let’s talk about the Andremily Rosé because there is nothing as exotic as this powerhouse. The first sip provided a Statue of Liberty worthy fireworks show and if “WTF” does not escape from your lips and your eyes don’t roll back in your head then you need to see a mortician because you are stone cold dead and even then I bet it can raise the dead.  For the second sip you better buckle up and check your zipper, ladies check your bra clasps!  If you can find a rare bottle of this juice for sale somewhere get ittttttttt by any means. Mourvèdre and weighing in at over 15% alcohol it should be in its own class “ExplosaRose”. It’s a yum yum berry bomb and I rarely drink Rosé.  If all the Exotic Islands were Rosé then this would be the St Barts. Did I say exotic, seductive, enchanting, Spicy, Sexxxxxy bowwww chicka boww bowww and in walked the wine maker Jim Binns the master of all things winelicious. Don’t hate me for being in St Barts hate me because a very kind and gifted man bestowed a 3 pack upon us.  For our last night tomorrow we are heading to Eden Rock to celebrate a wonderful week with great friends celebrating A special birthday. @er_stbarths @gypsea_beach @andremily_wines @krugoli @chateaulamissionhautbrion #france #stbarts #wine #clublife #beach #resort #sand #caribbean

node.text: Dinner last night at Bonito in St Barts.  We love this place and have never been disappointed. As you move thru the pics you can see one great dish after another  Guess which pair of shoes I chose for this fine evening? Either I was a little devilish or was I plundering Booty or just in a champagne 🍾 kind of mood.  Take a guess. I am with the Birthday Boy Matthew in the first shot.  More to come #stbarts @bonitostbarth #wine #restaurant #foodporn #france #finedining #winetasting

node.text: Have not stopped my faithful followers and the diet I will need to go on upon our return will be serious … but until then …bring  it on !!!! God I love this Island and it loves me! If I could have a kingdom or empire this would be headquarters.  The name would have to be changed from St Barts to St Alexander’s and only wine loving, gourmand food lovers would be issued Visas and there would be a 3 to 1 ratio of women to men. No silly not for the reasons you think but to make the island a more beautiful place in general. Off to Bonito Restaurant tonight and then spend the day at the beach at Gyp Sea a “Bohemian Beach Club”. Next to Nikki. I miss you alllll nottttt!!!!! Got to put in a honorable mention for the most valuable player on the island “ Le Cave du Port Franc” where they have kept us supplied with beautiful wines and champagne #nikkibeachstbarth @nikkibeachsaintbarth @gypsea_beach @fouquets.stbarth @chevalblancstbarth @blackgingersbh @tamarinstbarth @shellona_stbarth @caveduportfrancsbh #wine #foodporn #restaurant #islandlife #france #michelinstar #michelin #villa #carribean #paradice #bikini #champagne

node.text:
Ok now you can hate us! We are just half way thru this Birthday bash in St Barts.  And we have only put a small dent on the Island and I believe we have personally raised the GDP a few points. I can’t wait to tell you about the new restaurants and clubs but just no time to stop and write …already late getting ready for dinner tonight.  Today we spent the day at Cheval Blanc, yesterday Nikki Beach and have already eaten at Fouquet’s, Black Ginger, Tamarin, and off to Aux Amis tonight.  Stay tuned …,
#stbarts #birthdaybash #wine #restaurants #islandlife #islandparadise

node.text: Don’t hate us because we are beautiful hate us because we have this view from our Villa over looking the Eden Rock and Nikki Beach in St Barts!  We are celebrating two amazing friends birthdays for the week so much more to follow.  Off to Nikki …. So let the games begin…. Ohhhhh Bosworth Release the hounds. And fuel the yacht… pip pip Cheerio and all that rot… pop the corks… it’s good to be you my faithful followers but for the next few days it’s better to be us!  By the way met some great people last night and had a fun meal at BlackGinger@nikkibeachsaintbarth @blackgingersbh #paradise #islandlife #stbarts

node.text: To my faithful few followers I must ask if you are faint of heart look away from the following pictures because they are obscene and disturbing and may contain material that is not suitable for the easily made jealous. I think we hit a new level of debauchery for a Monday evening and we did it at one of my favorite restaurants … Domā …who’s glorious cuisine is second to none and could keep up with the wines this crew of gentleman ( their names will not be released due to the fact I think a few are in the witness protection program and the rest well they wish they were)! Our crimes are simple … we open outrageously beautiful wines and share them with each other and we pair them with outlandish cuisine. I have said it before and I will say it again the service, attention, and wine acumen of their crack staff alone would garner Michelin Stars but the the variety and flavors of their distinguished and unique dishes put them in another category all together! Food porn for sure and the centerfold can be lusted after as you open the menu.  Talking about hard core wine porn Let’s get to the wines.  A 1947 Margaux (are you kidding meee) a 1982 Cheval Blanc, a 1985 Lafite, a 1986 Mouton,  a 1986 Margaux, a 1990 Haut Brion, a 1986 Leoville, 1986 Yquem, and a gorgeous Spicy mystery addition the 1975 Heitz Martha’s Vineyard. This evening will go down in infamy as the cares of the world stopped for a moment and this band of weary travelers broke bread and drank historic wines while lying about beautiful women ( our wives of course)! Wines of the night? All of them like a beauty pageant just different.  A blonde a brunette a red head each with different attributes telling their story of their birth year and terroir and one more proud than the next. And each matured to the debutantes princesses and queens they became before we ended their lives so unceremoniously for our drinking pleasure.  I bestow on this group of gentlemen the title of Bordeaux Bandit Barons! @chateaumargaux @chateaulafiterothschild @heitzcellar @yquem_official #france #wine @domamiami #miami #florida #restaurant #foodporn #bordeaux #napavalley #foodporn

node.text: We discovered probably the most talented young man and next great Chef while visiting Bermuda.  He is a Chef Extraordinaire and I know soon to garner Michelin notoriety and Stars. He already is a star in his own right and garnered my highly coveted 5 Marquis Crown Rating as my wife and I were wowed by his one after another culinary creations. Food will never taste the same as he has set a new benchmark for all others to follow. Who is this Maestro of Gastronomic Excellence…. Hailing from Kenya let me introduce you to the next Michelangelo of Michelin Worthy Cuisine… The One and The Only Chef James Wambui!!!!!!! His Creative Culinary Studio is situated in the Rosedon Relais and Châteaux in the Huckleberry Restaurant.  He and the restaurant have garnered numerous awards but the delectable dishes speak and taste for themselves. I started with the King Crab, Asparagus & Vanilla (butter poached cream crab  white asparagus morels & English pea & vanilla purée) thats presentation was so beautiful I wanted to frame it.  We talk about pairing wine with food but even more importantly is the marriage of the ingredients in a dish and this was truly exceptional.  My palette was stimulated in so many ways that my eyes rolled back into my head ohhhhh myyyy Godddd!  I followed this with Breast of Young Hen (sous vide breast of hen braised leeks & Jerusalem artichokes .. summer black truffles & lemon confit). Ohhh mon dieu!!! Maria had the American Wagu Tenderloin pan roasted with carrot and spinach ragout .. Truffle Soil (wow it just melted into the dish) English pea purée and Shallot jus!  She kindly gave me a portion of this  and I knew I had reached heavens door.  The Service was stellar and a must mention was our waiter Sekar who was perfectly in tune to the Chef’s Culinary Repertoire and our feedback. (The butter was vegan and delicious. … it’s not nice to fool Mother Nature) @kiharawambui @huckleberrybda #foodporn #michelin #topchef #restaurant #bermuda #rosedonhotelbermuda #relaischateaux #wine #michelinstar #foodgasm #staff #travel #destination #cuisine #chef #kenya #africa #rum #india #wagu #hen #truffle

node.text: A quick jaunt over to Bermuda for 5 days and It included more things jabbed up my nose than a Cocaine Cowboy in 1980.  I had to test for Covid a few days before to apply for a travel permit and then being told they were not sure results would be back next day I went to another source for jab 2. Upon landing at the airport they tested us again and we had to quarantine in the Bermudaful (a cab driver gave me that word) Resort the “Hamilton Princess”! Our results showed up late that first night and we were free to roam the La Isla Bonita. On day three we had to test again so we could return to the United States.  I studied all night but was hoping I would fail. There was not a chance we were going to test positive for Covid because we were pumping so many “Dark and Stormy’s” (ginger beer and Goslings Black Seal rum ) and “Rum Swizzles” the National drink of the Island including both Goslings Black and Gold Seal Rums… orange and pineapple juice, Grenadine and Angostura, and of course the Swizzle (a stick) spun rapidly between your hands like trying to light a fire in the old days.  Screw another dose of Pfizer we found the cure for anything that ales (ails) you ( pardon the pun) including the Delta Variants!  Theeee just the right temperature and magnificent therapeutic ocean waters were to die for and with a  palette right out of a Gauguin painting. This Island is not for the faint of wallet or the affluently challenged and I suggest raiding the kids education funds because the little shits are not as deserving as you are and for that matter …are you sure they are really even yours!  Feel free to show them the pictures when it comes time to explain why they are applying for scholarships, loans  and grants. But I digress as usual.  Enjoy these pics and get ready for my Review of the next Great Chef and this positively amazing Bermudian restaurant and find we stumbled upon with a great wine list. Buckle up and stay Hungry my faithful food fussy followers! #bermuda @goslingsrum #rum #gingerbeer #bermuda @swizzle_inn @crystalcavesbermuda @princessbermuda #travel #vacation #drinks #beach #goslings #moongate #paradise #foodporn #restaurant #wine #liquor #covidwedding

node.text:
Played with the Music from Amore

When the moon hits your eye like a big pizza pie that’s Machialina (restaurant) 
When the world seems to shine and we drank some great wine that’s amore 
Bells will ring with a bottle of 04 tig na nallo ting ting a ling and we all did sing “Vita Bella”
Hearts will play tippy-tippy-tay, tippy-tippy-tay
Like a 97 Gaja Barbaresco 
When the (08)Cupano Brunello makes you drool just like a pasta fasul
That's amore
When you dance down the street with a 53 Barolo at your feet
You're in love. 
When you walk in a dream but you know you're not
Dreaming aaaay 97 Granatooooo
Scusa me, but you see, back in old Napoli with a 69 Vin Santo 
That's amore
When the moon hits you eye like a big pizza pie
That's amore (that's amore)
When the world seems to shine and we all had too much wine
That's amore (that's amore)

 Some other great additions can be seen in the picture including a great bottle of “Les terres Fines”  Dhondt- Grellet Champagne to Greece the wheels, (the 53 Barolo was a Denegri Lorenzo and for a bad vintage and it’s age it was beautiful) The Palari Faro was a smooth operator and there were other surprises as well.  But the company was exceptional and the service and cuisine were outstanding!  @giovannigaja @marchesiantinori @antinori.oficial @agricolaforadori @cupanomontalcino #italy #restaurants #foodporn @macchialina #wineporn #barolo #nebbiolo #sangiovese #piedmont #supertuscan #vinsanto #dessertwine #tuscany #miami #miamibeach #italianfood #italianwine #michelin

node.text:
Well it had to happen.  Lucifer himself showed up at my door step in the form of Peter Benjamin and asked me “What is it you desire” and After reeling off the usual “peace on earth and good will to man” azzzzzz iffffff and for realllll (
well you all can imagine my list.  But Lucifer said “Noooo What do you really really desire.” I said with a deviant smile to get up close and personal with 6 beautiful and sexy Italian Babes… hold them by their waists and get lost in their intoxicating beauty while enjoying their very essence on my lips and tongue.  With a devilish grin and a snap of his fingers we were at Dōma Restaurant ( where else would the devil eat food this  sinfully orgasmic). On the table were a bevy of  6 beautiful Italians ready for action and I had no dollar bills.  Oops damn that was another night.  Nooo there were 6 beautiful bottles from hells cellars itself.  Let’s delve into the 6 now. A 1960, 1970 and a 1972 Monsanto (Poggio Vineyard) Chianti Classico made up our evil first flight!  The 60 was good with nice fruit but the 70 expressed all the beauty of  Sangiovese and was my wine of the night.  The 72 would have fooled the best of you with its gorgeous Madeira and plum flavors and you would have gone to Barolo.  The Second Flight included a 58 and 64 Enrico Serefino Reserva Barolo and a 61  Castellano Reserva. Someone gave up their souls for these beauties. The common consensus was that the 58 and 64 must have had a little barbera masterfully blended in because they were a little off the flavor profile of typical older Nebbiolo but again outstanding flavor and fruit  for their age.  The 61 showed like an Arabian Stud with all its pedigree and glory as true Barolo and of course I am prejudiced to this amazing vintage. The dinner and staff were heavenly and it was full as usual ( on a Tuesday) Luca must have sold his soul as well because it’s the hottest ticket in town and for good reason. If this is what Hell is then I don’t want redemption… where do I sign! . ( did u catch the 666) ooops did I mention the 89 Pommery Cuvée Louise in Mag .. the Devil made me drink it and spectacular. #wine #italy #barolo #foodporn #devil #nebbiolo #sangiovese
